title: Immersed
description: Just when she thought it was safe to step into the light.After a daring escape from Elore, Avlyn finds that the Outerbounds isn't the haven of freedom she's hoped for. Deception and lies run rampant. Avlyn's powerful Immersion ability marks her as dangerous, but highly valuable.Will she find her place in this new world? Or have to die trying?
author: Jenetta Penner
